edu.illinois.mitra.starl.gvh

Class Comms

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.gvh.Comms

  • public class Comms
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all inter-agent communication threads. The Comms class is only instantiated by a GlobalVarHolder.
    See Also:
    GlobalVarHolder
